g.text: Schema validation of the incoming message
The above validation steps are already handled by
the ML-Adapter for the open source implementation.
It may need to be added in future for custom adapters.
Loop the list of returned hashes
and compare each entry with the
Request to retrieve Bulk transfer state
Request to retrieve Bulk transfer state
Request to persist bulk transfer fulfil
Break down the bulk into indidivual transfers
[for every individual transfer in the bulk fulfil list]
in the bulk using the reference
Route & Publish Prepare event to the Payer for the Individual Transfer
